p:
We used decadal population data
19 (for 2010–2100) to project changes in population density under Shared Socioeconomic Pathway 2 (SSP2). By use of the scenario matrix approach of Van Vuuren and colleagues,
20 we used the central SSP2 population projection for this century because of its overall compatibility with the RCP6.0 climate scen·ario in terms of adaptation and mitigation policies. Population data were stratified to include rural and urban populations with a gravity model-based approach.
19 The model was calibrated with historical data, and the SSP narrative was interpreted to specify internally consistent spatial patterns of urban and rural development.
